metaDescription: Discover GIANE VILLAS in Algorfa, La Finca Golf. Modern 3-bedroom villas from €478,000. Completion 2025. Golf community lifestyle on Costa Blanca.

content.heroIntro: Welcome to GIANE VILLAS, an exceptional residential development by FATIMA nestled in the prestigious La Finca Golf community in Algorfa, Alicante. These stunning 3-bedroom villas represent the perfect blend of modern architecture, premium finishes, and strategic location in one of Costa Blanca's most sought-after golf destinations. Each villa spans 113m² of carefully designed living space built on generous 315m² plots, offering the privacy and space discerning buyers demand. With prices starting from just €478,000 and completion scheduled for November 2025, GIANE VILLAS delivers exceptional value for those seeking a Mediterranean lifestyle without compromise. The development caters to international buyers attracted to the thriving English-speaking golf community, families seeking beachside proximity, and investors capitalizing on Costa Blanca's consistent property appreciation. FATIMA's proven track record in Algorfa ensures quality construction, reliable delivery, and professional service throughout your purchase journey.

locationSection.intro: La Finca Golf is a world-class golf resort and residential community that has established itself as the premier lifestyle destination on Costa Blanca. Located in Algorfa, this exclusive enclave combines championship golf, cosmopolitan amenities, and authentic Mediterranean charm. The area is renowned for attracting an international clientele who appreciate quality living, with English widely spoken throughout the resort. Algorfa itself maintains a relaxed village character while offering all essential services within minutes. The location strikes the perfect balance: far enough from crowded coastal towns to enjoy peace and affordability, yet close enough to beaches, healthcare, and shopping to maintain convenience. La Finca Golf's on-site amenities include restaurants, bars, and a vibrant community of expat residents, creating a welcoming environment for new arrivals. The climate is exceptional year-round, with guaranteed sunshine and mild winters ideal for golf and outdoor living.
highlights: Beaches: Guardamar beaches 15 minutes, La Mata 20 minutes
Golf: La Finca Golf on-site championship course
Shopping: Mercadona Rojales 10 minutes, Torrevieja 25 minutes
Schools: El Limonar 25 minutes, Torrevieja area schools

propertyFeatures.intro: GIANE VILLAS represents modern European construction standards at their finest. Built by FATIMA with meticulous attention to detail, each villa features premium materials, energy-efficient systems, and contemporary design that maximizes comfort and minimizes operating costs. The construction incorporates thermal efficiency, quality fixtures, and practical layouts designed for both permanent residence and holiday enjoyment. Double glazing with thermal break provides year-round climate control, while smart design ensures natural light and ventilation throughout.
features: Private swimming pool with surrounding terrace
Double glazing with thermal break windows
Video entry system and security features

content.investmentSection: GIANE VILLAS presents a compelling investment opportunity in a market demonstrating robust fundamentals. Algorfa properties have appreciated 12% year-on-year, outpacing many coastal alternatives. Priced at approximately €4,230 per square meter—50% below comparable coastal towns—these villas offer exceptional value entry points. Rental demand remains strong, with comparable properties achieving €900 per week for holiday lets, delivering annual gross yields of 7-8%. The La Finca Golf community attracts consistent international demand from golfers, retirees, and families seeking Mediterranean lifestyle. FATIMA's completion track record, combined with the area's growing infrastructure and amenities, positions GIANE VILLAS as a sound long-term investment. Whether seeking a personal residence, holiday home, or rental investment, this development delivers multiple paths to returns.
whyBuySection: Premium location within La Finca Golf resort community
Trusted developer FATIMA with proven Algorfa expertise
Exceptional value at 50% less than coastal alternatives
International golf community with English spoken throughout resort
15-minute access to Guardamar and La Mata beaches
Championship golf course on-site and neighboring courses

faqs.question: What is the price of properties in GIANE VILLAS?
faqs.answer: GIANE VILLAS villas start from €478,000 for 3-bedroom properties with 113m² of living space. The price represents exceptional value in the Costa Blanca market. Contact our sales team for current availability and specific unit pricing.

faqs.question: When will GIANE VILLAS be completed?
faqs.answer: Completion is scheduled for November 1, 2025. FATIMA provides a comprehensive 10-year structural warranty on all properties. Contact us for specific delivery schedules and payment plans tailored to your needs.

faqs.question: Who is the developer of GIANE VILLAS?
faqs.answer: FATIMA is the developer, a respected building company with an established track record constructing quality residential properties throughout Algorfa and surrounding Costa Blanca areas. They are known for reliable delivery and attention to construction standards.

faqs.question: Is Algorfa a good place to live?
faqs.answer: Yes, absolutely. Algorfa offers an excellent lifestyle for international residents, particularly those seeking golf community living. The area features a welcoming English-speaking expat community, strong property appreciation (+12% year-on-year), excellent amenities including Hospital de Torrevieja (20 minutes away), and beach access at Guardamar (15 minutes). It provides authentic Spanish village living without sacrificing convenience.

faqs.question: How far is GIANE VILLAS from the beach?
faqs.answer: Guardamar beaches are 15 minutes away by car, while La Mata beaches are 20 minutes away. Both offer excellent sandy beaches, beach bars, and water sports facilities. This proximity provides beach lifestyle access while maintaining the peaceful resort environment.

faqs.question: What amenities are near GIANE VILLAS?
faqs.answer: Nearby amenities include: Local village shops within the resort, Mercadona supermarket in Rojales (10 minutes), Hospital de Torrevieja (20 minutes), La Finca Golf course on-site, neighboring golf courses Lo Romero, La Marquesa, and Vistabella within 30 minutes, and Alicante Airport 30 minutes away. Healthcare, shopping, and leisure facilities are all conveniently accessible.

faqs.question: Can I rent out my GIANE VILLAS property?
faqs.answer: Yes, La Finca Golf properties demonstrate strong holiday rental demand. Comparable 3-bedroom villas achieve €900+ per week, translating to approximately 7-8% annual rental yields. The golf community attracts consistent international visitors. Management services are available through local property management companies.

faqs.question: What golf courses are near GIANE VILLAS?
faqs.answer: La Finca Golf championship course is on-site and within walking distance. Additional renowned courses nearby include Lo Romero, La Marquesa, and Vistabella, all within 30 minutes. The area is one of Costa Blanca's premier golf destinations with courses suitable for all handicaps.

content.conclusion: GIANE VILLAS represents a rare opportunity to acquire a premium villa in Costa Blanca's most coveted golf community at exceptional value. Combining FATIMA's construction expertise, La Finca Golf's lifestyle amenities, proximity to beaches, and proven rental potential, these properties deliver both quality of life and investment returns. Whether you're seeking a permanent Mediterranean residence, holiday retreat, or investment property, GIANE VILLAS checks every box. With completion scheduled for November 2025 and limited units available, now is the time to secure your place in this thriving international community. Contact our sales team via WhatsApp for detailed information, virtual tours, and exclusive pricing. Your Costa Blanca dream awaits.

golfCourse.name: La Finca Golf
golfCourse.description: Championship 18-hole golf course within the resort, walkable from GIANE VILLAS. Features restaurant, bar, and full clubhouse amenities. One of Costa Blanca's premier golf destinations.
